entry.name: icon
entry.label: The name of the custom icon to use for the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel) of the Folder View applet. Only used if useCustomIcon is true.

entry.name: useCustomIcon
entry.label: Whether to use a custom icon for the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel) of the Folder View Applet.

entry.name: ItemsGeometries
entry.label: Encoded geometries of items (resource categories).

entry.name: ToolBoxButtonState
entry.label: Position state of the toolbox button.

entry.name: ToolBoxButtonX
entry.label: X coordinate of the toolbox.

entry.name: ToolBoxButtonY
entry.label: Y coordinate of the toolbox.

entry.name: FirstStartup
entry.label: First time the containment starts?

entry.name: url
entry.label: URL of the file system location being shown.

entry.name: labelMode
entry.label: How to show the Folder View label: 0 = No label, 1 = Friendly version of path relative to closest Places entry, 2 = Full path, 3 = Custom title

entry.name: labelText
entry.label: Custom text for the Folder View label. Only used if labelMode is 3.

entry.name: arrangement
entry.label: How Folder View icons are arranged: 0 = Rows, 1 = Columns

entry.name: alignment
entry.label: How Folder View icons are aligned: 0 = Left, 1 = Right

entry.name: locked
entry.label: Whether Folder View icons are locked or not. Only used when serving as containment.

entry.name: sortMode
entry.label: How Folder View icons are sorted: 0 = Unsorted, 1 = Name, 2 = Size, 3 = Type, 4 = Date

entry.name: sortDesc
entry.label: Whether to sort Folder View icons descending instead of ascending.

entry.name: sortDirsFirst
entry.label: Whether to sort folders before files in Folder View.

entry.name: toolTips
entry.label: Whether to show info tooltips when hovering Folder View icons.

entry.name: selectionMarkers
entry.label: Whether to show selection markers when hovering Folder View icons.

entry.name: popups
entry.label: Whether to show a popup preview window for Folder View icons for folders.

entry.name: previews
entry.label: Whether to show preview thumbnails in Folder View.

entry.name: previewPlugins
entry.label: List of id's of the thumbnail preview plugins to use in Folder View.

entry.name: viewMode
entry.label: The Folder View view mode (used only by the widget full represntation): 0 = Grid, 1 = List

entry.name: iconSize
entry.label: The icon size to use for Folder View icons. One of the list of Plasma icon sizes.

entry.name: textLines
entry.label: The (maximum) number of lines of text to use below Folder View icons.

entry.name: textColor
entry.label: The text color to use below Folder View icons. Only used when serving as containment.

entry.name: filterPattern
entry.label: The pattern to filter files by. Supports wildcards.

entry.name: filterMode
entry.label: The file filter mode: 0 = Show All Files, 1 = Show Files Matching, 2 = Hide Files Matching

entry.name: filterMimeTypes
entry.label: List of MIME types to filter by.

entry.name: showTweaks
entry.label: Whether to show the "Tweaks" config page. Only used when serving as containment.

entry.name: showToolbox
entry.label: Whether to show the Desktop Toolbox. Only used when serving as containment.

entry.name: pressToMove
entry.label: Whether to activate widget handles and widget move mode by long press. Only used when serving as containment.

entry.name: pressToMoveHelp
entry.label: Whether to show an info notification about pressToMove mode after enabling it or when the containment becomes mutable (i.e. widgets are unlocked).
